dct_description_sm: Shows North African areas under British, French, Dutch, Portuguese and Spanish control as well as towns, roads, rivers, mountains.
"Ausg. in 63 Bl. No. LII. Stieler's Hand-Atlas (No. 45a)".
2 bar scales on map, given in "Deutsche Meilen" and "Englische Meilen" (scale statement: 1:14,000,000).
Profil von E. Vogel's Reisewege im J. 1853 von Tripoli nach dem Tasad See.
Inset maps: Profile of Eduard Vogel's journey in 1853 from Tripoli to the "Tasad See", and profile of James Richardson, Barth and Adolf Overweg's journey across the Sahara.
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
